mistral:7b-instruct: Given your comprehensive medical history that includes hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, stroke, and shortness of breath, this EPO plan from Australian Unity Health appears well-suited to your needs. This plan offers extensive coverage for hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care which are essential given your various health conditions. The monthly premium of $300 is manageable for a middle-income earner, while the coverage of $500,000 and maximum out-of-pocket expense of $6,500 provide substantial financial protection in case of unexpected medical events. Additionally, this plan's exclusion of cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments helps to ensure that you are not charged for services that may not be immediately necessary or medically justified given your current health profile.
